column5: Escaped Convict  >A man escapes from a prison where he's been locked >up for 15 years. He breaks into a house to look for >money and guns. Inside, he finds a young couple in bed. >He orders the guy out of bed and ties him to a chair.  >While tying the homeowner's wife to the bed, the >convict gets on top of her, kisses her neck, then gets >up and goes into the bathroom.  >While he's in there, the husband whispers over to his >wife: "Listen, this guy is an escaped convict. Look at >his clothes! He's probably spent a lot of time in jail >and hasn't seen a woman in years.  >I saw how he kissed your neck. If he wants sex, don't >resist, don't complain...do whatever he tells you. Satisfy >him no matter how much he nauseates you. This >guy is obviously very serous. If he gets angry,he'll >kill us both. Be strong, honey. I love you!"  >His wife responds: "He wasn't kissing my neck. He was >whispering in my ear. He told me that he's gay, he >thinks you're cute, and asked if we had any Vaseline. >I told him it was in the bathroom. Be strong honey. >I love you too."
